sentence.Network_en: We are all bound by the inevitability of death.
Success is an inevitability for us.
sentence.Network_cn: 胜利对我们来说是必然的。

sentence.Network_en: Evolutionism is normally associated with a belief in the inevitability of progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 进化主义通常和一种相信进步不可避免的看法相联系.

针对史学研究中对不可避免性（inevitability）的强调（尤其是爱国主义式的自由史观），方纳提出以“不确定性”（uncertainty）的观点 …

list.abs: Continental Crust is the inevitable product of formation and evolution of the Earth ., 大陆地壳是地球形成演化的必然产物.
(2)难免流产(inevitable abortion)：是先兆流产的继续，妊娠难以持续，有流产的临床过程，阴道出血时间较长，出血量较多，而且有 …
3. 不可避免性流产(Inevitable abortion)：子宫颈已扩张，阴道大量出血，持续子宫收缩，由于情况已严重到一定会流产，故称不可避 …
必然的英文翻译，必然用英语怎么说 -... ... 必然会 be destined to 必然趋势 inevitable trend 必然性 inevitability.
the inevitable result of social development ., 社会发展的必然结果.

entry.tran: 不可避免;无法规避;必然发生
entry.def: The inevitability of something is the fact that it is certain to happen and cannot be prevented or avoided.

example.ex: We are all bound by the inevitability of death...
Success is an inevitability for us.
example.tran: 胜利对我们来说是必然的。
